_comment: Update Logic Guide: 1. SOFT UPDATE: Set 'latestVersionCode' > app version (2). 'minVersionCode' <= app version. updateType='soft'. User can dismiss. 2. FORCE UPDATE: Set 'minVersionCode' > app version (2). updateType='force'. User LOCKED out until update.
forceUpdateMessage: A critical update is available. Please update to continue using the app.
updateMessage: A new version of Namma Metro Sahaya is available with improved features.
